attributes.comment:
It is completely unfair to include those going through the adoption process with
those initiating the process overseas. It is unfair that through no fault of our own
we should face the prospect of paying the same fee twice just by virtue of the
process extending beyond the 18-month deadline.

I am personally not opposed to a necessary fee increase that adequately covers
the services provided by the agency. I am adamantly opposed to paying a
increased fee twice for the same process.

An exception for international adoptions should be allowed.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Brad Yeager
